about_the_game:
Embark on an enchanting journey through a mystical world of danger and wonder in FiFi's Fortunes: Reclamation - a bullet hell video game. Test your reflexes like never before, as you fight to retrieve FiFi's mother's lost gemstones!

Key Features:

  • A retro-revival adventure: Dive into the heart of nostalgia, as FiFi's Fortunes: Reclamation pays homage to classic Japanese PC-98 video games, whilst adding a modern twist. Immerse yourself in a visually stunning universe with original characters.

  • Sexualised content: Meet a cast of characters who each have their own set of sexy fun!

  • Challenging gameplay: Prepare yourself for a challenge as FiFi's Fortunes: Reclamation offers a difficult bullet-hell experience, with difficulty settings that allow anyone to enjoy! Dodge intricate bullet patterns and flip cards to release gemstones. Test your reflexes, wit, and tactical prowess in this thrilling adventure.

  • Rich soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the melodic tapestry of FiFi's Fortunes: Reclamation, inspired by classic 16-bit tunes.

Prepare to be captivated by the magic of FiFi's Fortunes: Reclamation, a love letter to the PC-98 system, that brings a fresh and exciting experience to both newcomers and devoted fans alike. Unleash your inner power, reclaim what's rightfully yours, and meet a cast of fun characters.

*All characters that appaer within this game are over the age of 18.

Dodge intricate bullet patterns and flip cards to release gemstones. Test your reflexes, wit, and tactical prowess in this thrilling adventure.

  • Rich soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the melodic tapestry of FiFi's Fortunes: Reclamation, inspired by classic 16-bit tunes.

Prepare to be captivated by the magic of FiFi's Fortunes: Reclamation, a love letter to the PC-98 system, that brings a fresh and exciting experience to both newcomers and devoted fans alike. Unleash your inner power, reclaim what's rightfully yours, and meet a cast of fun characters.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: Modern Intel/AMD Processor, 1.6GHz+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 capabilities
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: More detailed system specs coming soon
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: More detailed system specs coming soon

name: FiFI's Fortunes: Reclamation

  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 capabilities

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Modern Intel/AMD Processor, 2.4GHz+
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
